title: RITO SERVERS PLS
body: So i was playing in a 5v5 ranked match when all of a sudden the infamous Attempting to Reconnect label appeared on my screen. This time, it wasn't my router or Optus's fault because apparently the rest of the players had the same lag. From there it got worse as i was stuck in base waiting to by my hextech gunblade whilst the enemy team was getting killed by turrets (i hope). Anyway I'm still in that game right now soooo RITO PLS?
